    1025             : ACE_INLINE void
    1026             : ACE_OS::swab (const void *src,
    1027             :               void *dest,
    1028             :               ssize_t length)
    1029             : {
    1030             : #if defined (ACE_LACKS_SWAB)
    1031             :   // ------------------------------------------------------------
    1032             :   // The following copyright notice applies to the swab()
    1033             :   // implementation within this "ACE_LACKS_SWAB" block of code.
    1034             :   // ------------------------------------------------------------
    1035             :   /*
    1036             :     Copyright (c) 1994-2006  Red Hat, Inc. All rights reserved.
    1037             : 
    1038             :     This copyrighted material is made available to anyone wishing to

    1044             :     this license is available at
    1045             :     http://www.opensource.org/licenses. Any Red Hat trademarks that

    1048             :     the express permission of Red Hat, Inc.
    1049             :   */
    1050             : 
    1051             :   const char *from = static_cast<const char*> (src);
    1052             :   char *to = static_cast<char *> (dest);
    1053             :   ssize_t ptr = 0;
    1054             :   for (ptr = 1; ptr < length; ptr += 2)
    1055             :     {
    1056             :       char p = from[ptr];
    1057             :       char q = from[ptr-1];
    1058             :       to[ptr-1] = p;
    1059             :       to[ptr  ] = q;
